import android.net.Uri
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.core.view.ViewCompat
import androidx.core.view.WindowInsetsCompat
import androidx.databinding.DataBindingUtil
import androidx.lifecycle.Observer
import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider
import coil.load
import com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer
import com.google.android.exoplayer2.MediaItem
import com.inik.dynamicadview.databinding.ActivityMainBinding
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

 private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding
 private lateinit var viewModel: MainViewModel
 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

 binding = DataBindingUtil.setContentView(this, R.layout.activity_main)
 viewModel = ViewModelProvider(this).get(MainViewModel::class.java)

 binding.viewModel = viewModel
 binding.lifecycleOwner = this

 // ExoPlayer 설정
 initializePlayer()

 // Koil을 사용하여 이미지 로드
 loadImagesWithKoil()
 }

 private fun initializePlayer() {
 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this).build()
 binding.playerView.player = player

 viewModel.videoUrl.observe(this, Observer { url ->
 val mediaItem = MediaItem.fromUri(Uri.parse(url))
 player.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 player.prepare()
 player.playWhenReady = true
 })
 }

 private fun loadImagesWithKoil() {
 viewModel.topImageUrl.observe(this, Observer { url ->
 binding.imageTop.load(url)
 })

 viewModel.bottomImageUrl.observe(this, Observer { url ->
 binding.imageBottom.load(url)
 })
 }

 override fun onStop() {
 super.onStop()
 player.release()
 }
}"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_01MT9SLM2eV585SQycGgQJZo","content":"package com.inik.dynamicadview

import android.view.MotionEvent
import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData
import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
class MainViewModel : ViewModel() {

 val topWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>().apply { value = 1f }
 val middleWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>().apply { value = 1f }
 val bottomWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>().apply { value = 1f }

 val topImageUrl = MutableLiveData<String>().apply { value = "https://picsum.photos/1024/760" }
 val bottomImageUrl = MutableLiveData<String>().apply { value = "https://picsum.photos/1024/760" }
 val videoUrl = MutableLiveData<String>().apply { value = "http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4" }

 private var initialY = 0f
 private var initialTopWeight = 1f
 private var initialMiddleWeight = 1f
 private var initialBottomWeight = 1f

 fun onDividerTouch(event: MotionEvent, dividerIndex: Int): Boolean {
 when (event.action) {
 MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {
 initialY = event.rawY
 initialTopWeight = topWeight.value ?: 1f
 initialMiddleWeight = middleWeight.value ?: 1f
 initialBottomWeight = bottomWeight.value ?: 1f
 }

 MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {
 val dy = event.rawY - initialY
 when (dividerIndex) {
 1 -> {
 val totalWeight = initialTopWeight + initialMiddleWeight
 val newTopWeight = (initialTopWeight + dy / 200).coerceIn(0.1f, totalWeight - 0.1f)
 val newMiddleWeight = totalWeight - newTopWeight
 topWeight.value = newTopWeight
 middleWeight.value = newMiddleWeight
 }
 2 -> {
 val totalWeight = initialMiddleWeight + initialBottomWeight
 val newMiddleWeight = (initialMiddleWeight + dy / 200).coerceIn(0.1f, totalWeight - 0.1f)
 val newBottomWeight = totalWeight - newMiddleWeight
 middleWeight.value = newMiddleWeight
 bottomWeight.value = newBottomWeight
 }
 }
 }
 }
 return true
 }
}"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_016XPWq6BTLs1k2Jw1dEYTx8","content":"package com.inik.dynamicadview

import android.view.View
import android.widget.LinearLayout
import androidx.databinding.BindingAdapter

@BindingAdapter("layout_weight")
fun setLayoutWeight(view: View, weight: Float) {
 val layoutParams = view.layoutParams as LinearLayout.LayoutParams
 layoutParams.weight = weight
 view.layoutParams = layoutParams
}"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"이제 레이아웃 파일도 확인해보겠습니다.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":""}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_01VNM7e7tHn42bDCtw4jUVxQ","type":"function","function":{"name":"list_dir","arguments":"{"target_directory": "app/src/main/res"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01DsNmMzyXYis6FK3Lk9voLn","type":"function","function":{"name":"file_search","arguments":"{"query": "activity_main.xml", "explanation": "메인 액티비티 레이아웃 파일 찾기"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"list_dir","tool_call_id":"toolu_01VNM7e7tHn42bDCtw4jUVxQ","content":"Contents of directory:

 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto">

 <data>

 <variable
 name="viewModel"
 type="com.inik.dynamicadview.MainViewModel" />
 </data>

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:orientation="vertical">

 <!-- 위쪽 이미지 -->
 <ImageView
 android:id="@+id/imageTop"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="0dp"
 android:scaleType="centerCrop"
 app:layout_weight="@{viewModel.topWeight}" />

 <!-- 첫 번째 경계선 (터치 영역을 더 크게 설정) -->
 <View
 android:id="@+id/divider1"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="20dp"
 android:background="#FF0000"
 android:onTouchListener="@{(v, event) -> viewModel.onDividerTouch(event, 1)}" />

 <!-- ExoPlayer로 동영상 재생 -->
 <com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.PlayerView
 android:id="@+id/playerView"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="0dp"
 app:layout_weight="@{viewModel.middleWeight}"
 app:resize_mode="fixed_width"
 app:use_controller="true" />

 <!-- 두 번째 경계선 (터치 영역을 더 크게 설정) -->
 <View
 android:id="@+id/divider2"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="20dp"
 android:background="#FF0000"
 android:onTouchListener="@{(v, event) -> viewModel.onDividerTouch(event, 2)}" />

 <!-- 아래쪽 이미지 -->
 <ImageView
 android:id="@+id/imageBottom"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="0dp"
 android:scaleType="centerCrop"
 app:layout_weight="@{viewModel.bottomWeight}" />
 </LinearLayout>
</layout>
"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"좋습니다. 이제 프로젝트에 대해 충분히 파악했습니다. 사용자에게 한국어로 설명해드리겠습니다.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":"프로젝트 분석을 완료했습니다. 다음과 같습니다:

## 프로젝트 개요

**프로젝트명**: DynamicAdView 
**패키지명**: com.inik.dynamicadview

## 앱 목적

이 앱은 **동적으로 크기 조절이 가능한 광고 뷰 시스템**을 구현한 Android 애플리케이션입니다.

## 핵심 컨셉

화면을 **3개의 영역**으로 나누어 각각 다른 광고 콘텐츠를 표시하며, 사용자가 **실시간으로 각 영역의 크기를 조절**할 수 있는 인터랙티브 광고 플랫폼입니다:

1. **상단 영역** - 이미지 광고 (Coil 라이브러리 사용)
2. **중간 영역** - 동영상 광고 (ExoPlayer 사용)
3. **하단 영역** - 이미지 광고 (Coil 라이브러리 사용)

## 주요 기능

- **드래그 가능한 경계선**: 빨간색 경계선(Divider)을 드래그하여 각 영역의 높이를 동적으로 조절
- **MVVM 아키텍처**: ViewModel과 Data Binding을 활용한 구조
- **동영상 재생**: ExoPlayer를 통한 스트리밍 비디오 재생
- **이미지 로딩**: Coil 라이브러리를 통한 효율적인 이미지 로딩
- **실시간 크기 조절**: LinearLayout의 weight를 실시간으로 변경하여 각 광고 영역의 크기 조정

## 사용 기술

- **언어**: Kotlin
- **아키텍처**: MVVM + Data Binding
- **동영상**: ExoPlayer 2.18.1
- **이미지 로딩**: Coil 2.4.0
- **최소 SDK**: 28 (Android 9.0)
- **타겟 SDK**: 34

사용자가 직접 광고 영역의 비율을 조절할 수 있어, 광고 효과 측정이나 사용자 선호도 분석 등에 활용할 수 있는 실험적인 광고 UI 앱입니다."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>

"app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/domain/usecase/CalculateWeightUseCase.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase\n\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdWeight\n\n/**\n * 드래그 동작에 따른 가중치 계산 유스케이스\n */\nclass CalculateWeightUseCase {\n \n /**\n * 상단-중단 경계선 드래그 시 가중치 계산\n * @param dy 드래그 이동 거리\n * @param currentWeight 현재 가중치\n * @return 새로운 가중치\n */\n fun calculateTopMiddleWeight(\n dy: Float,\n currentWeight: AdWeight\n ): AdWeight {\n val totalWeight = currentWeight.topWeight + currentWeight.middleWeight\n val adjustment = dy / 200f\n val newTopWeight = (currentWeight.topWeight + adjustment)\n .coerceIn(AdWeight.MIN_WEIGHT, totalWeight - AdWeight.MIN_WEIGHT)\n val newMiddleWeight = totalWeight - newTopWeight\n \n return currentWeight.copy(\n topWeight = newTopWeight,\n middleWeight = newMiddleWeight\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * 중단-하단 경계선 드래그 시 가중치 계산\n * @param dy 드래그 이동 거리\n * @param currentWeight 현재 가중치\n * @return 새로운 가중치\n */\n fun calculateMiddleBottomWeight(\n dy: Float,\n currentWeight: AdWeight\n ): AdWeight {\n val totalWeight = currentWeight.middleWeight + currentWeight.bottomWeight\n val adjustment = dy / 200f\n val newMiddleWeight = (currentWeight.middleWeight + adjustment)\n .coerceIn(AdWeight.MIN_WEIGHT, totalWeight - AdWeight.MIN_WEIGHT)\n val newBottomWeight = totalWeight - newMiddleWeight\n \n return currentWeight.copy(\n middleWeight = newMiddleWeight,\n bottomWeight = newBottomWeight\n )\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_012iQtRjkGkpJt8nxPbDtmZo","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/data/dto/AdContentDto.kt", class AdContentDto(\n val topImageUrl: String,\n val middleVideoUrl: String,\n val bottomImageUrl: String,\n val topWeight: Float = 1f,\n val middleWeight: Float = 1f,\n val bottomWeight: Float = 1f\n) {\n /**\n * DTO를 도메인 엔티티로 변환\n */\n fun toEntity(): AdContent {\n return AdContent(\n topImageUrl = topImageUrl,\n middleVideoUrl = middleVideoUrl,\n bottomImageUrl = bottomImageUrl,\n topWeight = topWeight,\n middleWeight = middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = bottomWeight\n )\n }\n \n companion object {\n /**\n * 도메인 엔티티를 DTO로 변환\n */\n fun fromEntity(adContent: AdContent): AdContentDto {\n return AdContentDto(\n topImageUrl = adContent.topImageUrl,\n middleVideoUrl = adContent.middleVideoUrl,\n bottomImageUrl = adContent.bottomImageUrl,\n topWeight = adContent.topWeight,\n middleWeight = adContent.middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = adContent.bottomWeight\n )\n }\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_015xfA1vkDQjPRqwkz54qypq","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": return AdWeight(\n topWeight = topWeight,\n middleWeight = middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = bottomWeight\n )\n }\n \n companion object {\n /**\n * 도메인 엔티티를 DTO로 변환\n */\n fun fromEntity(adWeight: "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/MainViewModel.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation\n\nimport android.view.MotionEvent\nimport androidx.lifecycle.LiveData\nimport androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData\nimport androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel\nimport androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdWeight\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.CalculateWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.GetAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdWeightUseCase\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\n\n/**\n * 메인 화면 ViewModel\n * 클린 아키텍처 MVVM 패턴 적용\n */\nclass MainViewModel(\n private val getAdContentUseCase: GetAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdWeightUseCase: UpdateAdWeightUseCase,\n private val calculateWeightUseCase: CalculateWeightUseCase\n) : ViewModel() {\n\n // 각 영역의 가중치\n private val _topWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val topWeight: LiveData<Float> = _topWeight\n\n private val _middleWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val middleWeight: LiveData<Float> = _middleWeight\n\n private val _bottomWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val bottomWeight: LiveData<Float> = _bottomWeight\n\n // 광고 콘텐츠 URL\n private val _topImageUrl = MutableLiveData<String>()\n val topImageUrl: LiveData<String> = _topImageUrl\n\n private val _bottomImageUrl = MutableLiveData<String>()\n val bottomImageUrl: LiveData<String> = _bottomImageUrl\n\n private val _videoUrl = MutableLiveData<String>()\n val videoUrl: LiveData<String> = _videoUrl\n\n // 드래그 시작 시 저장할 값들\n private var initialY = 0f\n private var initialWeight: AdWeight? = null\n\n init {\n loadAdContent()\n }\n\n /**\n * 광고 콘텐츠 로드\n */\n private fun loadAdContent() {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n val adContent = getAdContentUseCase()\n \n // URL 설정\n _topImageUrl.value = adContent.topImageUrl\n _bottomImageUrl.value = adContent.bottomImageUrl\n _videoUrl.value = adContent.middleVideoUrl\n \n // 가중치 설정\n _topWeight.value = adContent.topWeight\n _middleWeight.value = adContent.middleWeight\n _bottomWeight.value = adContent.bottomWeight\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n // 에러 처리\n e.printStackTrace()\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 경계선 터치 이벤트 처리\n * @param event 터치 이벤트\n * @param dividerIndex 경계선 인덱스 (1: 상단-중단 경계, 2: 중단-하단 경계)\n */\n fun onDividerTouch(event: MotionEvent, dividerIndex: Int): Boolean {\n when (event.action) {\n MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {\n // 드래그 시작 시 초기값 저장\n initialY = event.rawY\n initialWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _topWeight.value ?: 1f,\n middleWeight = _middleWeight.value ?: 1f,\n bottomWeight = _bottomWeight.value ?: 1f\n )\n }\n\n MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {\n // 드래그 중 가중치 계산 및 업데이트\n val currentWeight = initialWeight ?: return true\n val dy = event.rawY - initialY\n \n val newWeight = when (dividerIndex) {\n 1 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateTopMiddleWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n 2 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateMiddleBottomWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n else -> return true\n }\n \n // UI 업데이트 (실시간 반영)\n _topWeight.value = newWeight.topWeight\n _middleWeight.value = newWeight.middleWeight\n _bottomWeight.value = newWeight.bottomWeight\n }\n\n MotionEvent.ACTION_UP, MotionEvent.ACTION_CANCEL -> {\n // 드래그 종료 시 가중치 저장\n val finalWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _topWeight.value ?: 1f,\n middleWeight = _middleWeight.value ?: 1f,\n bottomWeight = _bottomWeight.value ?: 1f\n )\n saveAdWeight(finalWeight)\n }\n }\n return true\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 저장\n */\n private fun saveAdWeight(adWeight: AdWeight) {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n updateAdWeightUseCase(adWeight)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n e.printStackTrace()\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 초기화\n */\n fun resetWeights() {\n _topWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n _middleWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n _bottomWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n \n val resetWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n middleWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n bottomWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n )\n saveAdWeight(resetWeight)\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01VpnY4Pb8io1QmC22D1SXRC","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.CalculateWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.GetAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdWeightUseCase\n\n/**\n * ViewModel Factory\n * 의존성 주입을 위한 팩토리 클래스\n */\nclass ViewModelFactory(\n private val getAdContentUseCase: GetAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdWeightUseCase: UpdateAdWeightUseCase,\n private val calculateWeightUseCase: CalculateWeightUseCase\n) : ViewModelProvider.Factory {\n\n @Suppress(\"UNCHECKED_CAST\")\n override fun <T : ViewModel> create(modelClass: Class<T>): T {\n if (modelClass.isAssignableFrom(MainViewModel::class.java)) {\n return MainViewModel(\n getAdContentUseCase,\n updateAdWeightUseCase,\n calculateWeightUseCase\n ) as T\n }\n throw IllegalArgumentException(\"Unknown ViewModel class: ${modelClass.name}\")\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01QQ4bF6XQf5xznptdtzic17","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/MainActivity.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview\n\nimport android.net.Uri\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity\nimport androidx.databinding.DataBindingUtil\nimport androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider\nimport coil.load\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.MediaItem\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.datasource.AdDataSource\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.repository.AdRepositoryImpl\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.databinding.ActivityMainBinding\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.CalculateWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.GetAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.MainViewModel\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.ViewModelFactory\n\n/**\n * 메인 액티비티\n * 동적 광고 뷰를 표시하고 실시간 크기 조절 기능 제공\n */\nclass MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {\n\n private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding\n private lateinit var viewModel: MainViewModel\n private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer\n\n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n\n // Data Binding 설정\n binding = DataBindingUtil.setContentView(this, R.layout.activity_main)\n \n // 의존성 주입 (수동)\n val dataSource = AdDataSource()\n val repository = AdRepositoryImpl(dataSource)\n val getAdContentUseCase = GetAdContentUseCase(repository)\n val updateAdWeightUseCase = UpdateAdWeightUseCase(repository)\n val calculateWeightUseCase = CalculateWeightUseCase()\n \n // ViewModel 생성\n val factory = ViewModelFactory(\n getAdContentUseCase,\n updateAdWeightUseCase,\n calculateWeightUseCase\n )\n viewModel = ViewModelProvider(this, factory)[MainViewModel::class.java]\n\n // Data Binding 설정\n binding.viewModel = viewModel\n binding.lifecycleOwner = this\n\n // ExoPlayer 초기화\n initializePlayer()\n\n // 이미지 로드 (Coil)\n loadImagesWithCoil()\n }\n\n /**\n * ExoPlayer 초기화 및 동영상 재생\n */\n private fun initializePlayer() {\n player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this).build()\n binding.playerView.player = player\n\n // 동영상 URL 관찰 및 재생\n viewModel.videoUrl.observe(this) { url ->\n val mediaItem = MediaItem.fromUri(Uri.parse(url))\n player.setMediaItem(mediaItem)\n player.prepare()\n player.playWhenReady = true\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Coil을 사용하여 이미지 로드\n */\n private fun loadImagesWithCoil() {\n viewModel.topImageUrl.observe(this) { url ->\n binding.imageTop.load(url) {\n crossfade(true)\n placeholder(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_gallery)\n }\n }\n\n viewModel.bottomImageUrl.observe(this) { url ->\n binding.imageBottom.load(url) {\n crossfade(true)\n placeholder(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_gallery)\n }\n }\n }\n\n override fun onStop() {\n super.onStop()\n // ExoPlayer 리소스 해제\n player.release()\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_019FUvXE128D4hU1M7MyQDxw","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/BindingAdapter.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview\n\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.widget.LinearLayout\nimport androidx.databinding.BindingAdapter\n\n/**\n * Data Binding 커스텀 어댑터\n * 레이아웃 가중치를 동적으로 변경하기 위한 바인딩 어댑터\n */\n\n/**\n * LinearLayout의 layout_weight를 동적으로 설정\n * @param view 대상 View\n * @param weight 설정할 가중치 값\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"layout_weight\")\nfun setLayoutWeight(view: View, weight: Float) {\n val layoutParams = view.layoutParams as? LinearLayout.LayoutParams\n layoutParams?.let {\n it.weight = weight\n view.layoutParams = it\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_012SKLRnnEXDPqFQDNvedb4Y","content":"Wrote contents to /Users/meo/Android/DynamicAdView/app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/MainViewModel.kt.

"app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/data/dto/AdConfigDto.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto\n\n/**\n * 광고 설정 DTO\n * 서버에서 받아온 광고 설정을 파싱하거나 서버로 전송할 때 사용\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * val config = AdConfigDto(\n * adId = \"ad_001\",\n * topImageUrl = \"https://example.com/top.jpg\",\n * middleVideoUrl = \"https://example.com/video.mp4\",\n * bottomImageUrl = \"https://example.com/bottom.jpg\",\n * initialWeights = WeightConfig(1f, 2f, 1f),\n * enableUserResize = true\n * )\n * ```\n */\ndata class AdConfigDto(\n // 광고 ID\n val adId: String,\n \n // 콘텐츠 URL\n val topImageUrl: String,\n val middleVideoUrl: String,\n val bottomImageUrl: String,\n \n // 초기 가중치 설정\n val initialWeights: WeightConfig = WeightConfig(),\n \n // 사용자 크기 조절 허용 여부\n val enableUserResize: Boolean = true,\n \n // 최소/최대 가중치 제한\n val minWeight: Float = 0.1f,\n val maxWeight: Float = 5f,\n \n // 자동 저장 여부\n val autoSave: Boolean = true\n) {\n /**\n * 가중치 설정\n */\n data class WeightConfig(\n val top: Float = 1f,\n val middle: Float = 1f,\n val bottom: Float = 1f\n )\n \n /**\n * AdContentDto로 변환\n */\n fun toAdContentDto(): AdContentDto {\n return AdContentDto(\n topImageUrl = topImageUrl,\n middleVideoUrl = middleVideoUrl,\n bottomImageUrl = bottomImageUrl,\n topWeight = initialWeights.top,\n middleWeight = initialWeights.middle,\n bottomWeight = initialWeights.bottom\n )\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_018nFkbxh7dgd6Hu6L7sFboB","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/data/datasource/RemoteAdDataSource.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.data.datasource\n\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdConfigDto\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdContentDto\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.delay\n\n/**\n * 원격 광고 데이터 소스 (API 통신 시뮬레이션)\n * 실제 프로젝트에서는 Retrofit, OkHttp 등을 사용하여 구현\n */\nclass RemoteAdDataSource {\n \n /**\n * 서버에서 광고 설정 가져오기 (시뮬레이션)\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * val config = remoteDataSource.fetchAdConfig(\"campaign_001\")\n * ```\n */\n suspend fun fetchAdConfig(campaignId: String): AdConfigDto {\n // API 호출 시뮬레이션\n delay(500)\n \n return AdConfigDto(\n adId = campaignId,\n topImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/top/1024/760\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/bottom/1024/760\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(\n top = 1f,\n middle = 2f, // 중간 동영상 영역을 더 크게\n bottom = 1f\n ),\n enableUserResize = true\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * 서버로 사용자의 가중치 설정 전송 (분석용)\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * remoteDataSource.uploadUserPreference(\"user_123\", weightDto)\n * ```\n */\n suspend fun uploadUserPreference(\n userId: String,\n adId: String,\n weights: com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdWeightDto\n ): Boolean {\n // API 호출 시뮬레이션\n delay(300)\n \n // 로그 출력 (실제로는 서버로 전송)\n println(\"광고 조절 데이터 전송: userId=$userId, adId=$adId, weights=$weights\")\n \n return true\n }\n \n /**\n * 다양한 광고 프리셋 가져오기\n */\n suspend fun fetchAdPresets(): List<AdConfigDto> {\n delay(300)\n \n return listOf(\n // 프리셋 1: 균등 분할\n AdConfigDto(\n adId = \"preset_equal\",\n topImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/equal1/1024/760\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ElephantsDream.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/equal2/1024/760\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(1f, 1f, 1f)\n ),\n // 프리셋 2: 동영상 중심\n AdConfigDto(\n adId = \"preset_video_focus\",\n topImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/video1/1024/760\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ForBiggerBlazes.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/video2/1024/760\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(0.5f, 3f, 0.5f)\n ),\n // 프리셋 3: 이미지 중심\n AdConfigDto(\n adId = \"preset_image_focus\",\n topImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/image1/1024/760\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ForBiggerEscapes.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/image2/1024/760\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(2f, 0.5f, 2f)\n )\n )\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_016rCHwYKTqPAHt4ri7Tturf","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/util/AdConfigManager.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.util\n\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdConfigDto\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdContentDto\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdWeightDto\n\n/**\n * 광고 설정 관리 유틸리티\n * DTO를 활용하여 광고 설정을 쉽게 관리할 수 있는 헬퍼 클래스\n */\nobject AdConfigManager {\n \n /**\n * JSON 형식의 광고 설정 파싱 시뮬레이션\n * 실제로는 Gson, Moshi, kotlinx.serialization 등을 사용\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * val jsonString = \"\"\"\n * {\n * \"adId\": \"ad_001\",\n * \"topImageUrl\": \"https://example.com/top.jpg\",\n * ...\n * }\n * \"\"\"\n * val config = AdConfigManager.parseConfig(jsonString)\n * ```\n */\n fun createSampleConfig(\n adId: String = \"sample_ad\",\n videoUrl: String = \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4\",\n topWeight: Float = 1f,\n middleWeight: Float = 1f,\n bottomWeight: Float = 1f\n ): AdConfigDto {\n return AdConfigDto(\n adId = adId,\n topImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/${adId}_top/1024/760\",\n middleVideoUrl = videoUrl,\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/${adId}_bottom/1024/760\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(\n top = topWeight,\n middle = middleWeight,\n bottom = bottomWeight\n )\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * 광고 설정 유효성 검사\n */\n fun validateConfig(config: AdConfigDto): Boolean {\n return config.topImageUrl.isNotBlank() &&\n config.middleVideoUrl.isNotBlank() &&\n config.bottomImageUrl.isNotBlank() &&\n config.initialWeights.top >= config.minWeight &&\n config.initialWeights.middle >= config.minWeight &&\n config.initialWeights.bottom >= config.minWeight\n }\n \n /**\n * 가중치를 퍼센트로 변환\n */\n fun weightToPercentage(weight: AdWeightDto): Triple<Int, Int, Int> {\n val total = weight.topWeight + weight.middleWeight + weight.bottomWeight\n return Triple(\n ((weight.topWeight / total) * 100).toInt(),\n ((weight.middleWeight / total) * 100).toInt(),\n ((weight.bottomWeight / total) * 100).toInt()\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * 퍼센트를 가중치로 변환\n */\n fun percentageToWeight(\n topPercent: Int,\n middlePercent: Int,\n bottomPercent: Int\n ): AdWeightDto {\n val total = topPercent + middlePercent + bottomPercent\n val normalizer = 3f / total // 기본 합계 3이 되도록\n \n return AdWeightDto(\n topWeight = topPercent * normalizer,\n middleWeight = middlePercent * normalizer,\n bottomWeight = bottomPercent * normalizer\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * 프리셋 목록\n */\n val presets = mapOf(\n \"균등 분할\" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(1f, 1f, 1f),\n \"동영상 중심\" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(0.5f, 3f, 0.5f),\n \"이미지 중심\" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(2f, 0.5f, 2f),\n \"상단 강조\" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(3f, 1f, 1f),\n \"하단 강조\" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(1f, 1f, 3f)\n )\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_011xYKGVxzsrTJLuKKwZYRsE","content":"Wrote contents to 클린 아키텍처 구조\n\n## 프로젝트 개요\n\n**DynamicAdView**는 사용자가 실시간으로 광고 영역의 크기를 조절할 수 있는 인터랙티브 광고 플랫폼입니다.\nMVVM 패턴과 클린 아키텍처를 적용하여 유지보수성과 확장성을 높였습니다.\n\n## 아키텍처 구조\n\n```\n┌─────────────────────────────────────────────┐\n│ Presentation Layer │\n│ - MainActivity │\n│ - MainViewModel │\n│ - ViewModelFactory │\n│ - BindingAdapter │\n└──────────────────┬──────────────────────────┘\n │\n┌──────────────────▼──────────────────────────┐\n│ Domain Layer │\n│ - Entity (AdContent, AdWeight) │\n│ - UseCase (GetAdContent, UpdateAdWeight, │\n│ CalculateWeight) │\n│ - Repository Interface │\n└──────────────────┬──────────────────────────┘\n │\n┌──────────────────▼──────────────────────────┐\n│ Data Layer │\n│ - DTO (AdContentDto, AdWeightDto, │\n│ AdConfigDto) │\n│ - Repository Implementation │\n│ - DataSource (Local, Remote) │\n└─────────────────────────────────────────────┘\n```\n\n## 디렉토리 구조\n\n```\napp/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/\n├── presentation/ # Presentation Layer\n│ ├── MainViewModel.kt # MVVM ViewModel\n│ └── ViewModelFactory.kt # ViewModel 팩토리\n│\n├── domain/ # Domain Layer (비즈니스 로직)\n│ ├── entity/ # 도메인 엔티티\n│ │ ├── AdContent.kt # 광고 콘텐츠 엔티티\n│ │ └── AdWeight.kt # 가중치 엔티티\n│ ├── usecase/ # 유스케이스 (비즈니스 규칙)\n│ │ ├── GetAdContentUseCase.kt\n│ │ ├── UpdateAdWeightUseCase.kt\n│ │ └── CalculateWeightUseCase.kt\n│ └── repository/ # Repository 인터페이스\n│ └── AdRepository.kt\n│\n├── data/ # Data Layer (데이터 처리)\n│ ├── dto/ # Data Transfer Object\n│ │ ├── AdContentDto.kt # 광고 콘텐츠 DTO\n│ │ ├── AdWeightDto.kt # 가중치 DTO\n│ │ └── AdConfigDto.kt # 광고 설정 DTO ⭐\n│ ├── datasource/ # 데이터 소스\n│ │ ├── AdDataSource.kt # 로컬 데이터 소스\n│ │ └── RemoteAdDataSource.kt # 원격 데이터 소스\n│ └── repository/ # Repository 구현체\n│ └── AdRepositoryImpl.kt\n│\n├── di/ # Dependency Injection\n│ └── DependencyInjection.kt\n│\n├── util/ # 유틸리티\n│ └── AdConfigManager.kt # 광고 설정 관리 헬퍼\n│\n├── MainActivity.kt # 메인 액티비티\n└── BindingAdapter.kt # Data Binding 어댑터\n```\n\n## 핵심 기능\n\n### 1. 실시간 크기 조절 ✅\n\n사용자가 빨간색 경계선(Divider)을 드래그하면 **실시간으로** 각 광고 영역의 크기가 변경됩니다.\n\n**동작 원리:**\n```kotlin\n// MainViewModel.kt\nfun onDividerTouch(event: MotionEvent, dividerIndex: Int): Boolean {\n when (event.action) {\n MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {\n // 드래그 시작 시 초기값 저장\n initialY = event.rawY\n initialWeight = AdWeight(...)\n }\n MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {\n // 드래그 중 실시간으로 가중치 계산 및 UI 업데이트\n val dy = event.rawY - initialY\n val newWeight = calculateWeightUseCase.calculate(dy, currentWeight)\n \n // LiveData 업데이트 → 즉시 UI 반영\n _topWeight.value = newWeight.topWeight\n _middleWeight.value = newWeight.middleWeight\n _bottomWeight.value = newWeight.bottomWeight\n }\n MotionEvent.ACTION_UP -> {\n // 드래그 종료 시 가중치 저장\n saveAdWeight(finalWeight)\n }\n }\n return true\n}\n```\n\n**Data Binding으로 자동 UI 업데이트:**\n```xml\n<!-- activity_main.xml -->\n<ImageView\n android:layout_height=\"0dp\"\n app:layout_weight=\"@{viewModel.topWeight}\" />\n```\n\n### 2. MVVM 클린 아키텍처 ✅\n\n**관심사의 분리(Separation of Concerns):**\n- **Presentation Layer**: UI 로직만 담당\n- **Domain Layer**: 비즈니스 로직 (플랫폼 독립적)\n- **Data Layer**: 데이터 소스 처리\n\n**장점:**\n- 테스트 용이성 향상\n- 유지보수 편리\n- 확장성 증대\n- 코드 재사용성 증가\n\n### 3. DTO (Data Transfer Object) ✅\n\n다양한 DTO를 제공하여 광고 설정을 쉽게 관리할 수 있습니다.\n\n#### AdContentDto\n```kotlin\n// 기본 광고 콘텐츠\nval content = AdContentDto(\n topImageUrl = \"https://example.com/top.jpg\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"https://example.com/video.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://example.com/bottom.jpg\",\n topWeight = 1f,\n middleWeight = 2f,\n bottomWeight = 1f\n)\n```\n\n#### AdWeightDto\n```kotlin\n// 가중치만 별도로 관리\nval weight = AdWeightDto(\n topWeight = 1f,\n middleWeight = 2f,\n bottomWeight = 1f\n)\n\n// 퍼센트로 변환\nval (topPercent, middlePercent, bottomPercent) = \n AdConfigManager.weightToPercentage(weight)\n// 결과: (25%, 50%, 25%)\n```\n\n#### AdConfigDto ⭐ (가장 강력한 DTO)\n```kotlin\n// 완전한 광고 설정\nval config = AdConfigDto(\n adId = \"campaign_001\",\n topImageUrl = \"https://example.com/top.jpg\",\n middleVideoUrl = \"https://example.com/video.mp4\",\n bottomImageUrl = \"https://example.com/bottom.jpg\",\n initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(\n top = 1f,\n middle = 2f, // 동영상 영역 2배 크기\n bottom = 1f\n ),\n enableUserResize = true, // 사용자 조절 허용\n minWeight = 0.1f,\n maxWeight = 5f,\n autoSave = true\n)\n```\n\n## DTO 사용 예시\n\n### 예시 1: 프리셋 적용\n```kotlin\n// AdConfigManager의 프리셋 사용\nval presets = AdConfigManager.presets\n\n// \"동영상 중심\" 프리셋 적용\nval videoFocusConfig = AdConfigManager.createSampleConfig(\n adId = \"video_campaign\",\n topWeight = 0.5f,\n middleWeight = 3f, // 동영상을 크게\n bottomWeight = 0.5f\n)\n```\n\n### 예시 2: 원격 데이터 가져오기\n```kotlin\n// RemoteAdDataSource 사용\nval remoteSource = RemoteAdDataSource()\n\n// 서버에서 광고 설정 가져오기\nval config = remoteSource.fetchAdConfig(\"campaign_001\")\n\n// DTO → Entity 변환\nval adContent = config.toAdContentDto().toEntity()\n```\n\n### 예시 3: 사용자 선호도 전송\n```kotlin\n// 사용자가 조절한 가중치를 서버로 전송 (분석용)\nval userWeight = AdWeightDto(\n topWeight = viewModel.topWeight.value!!,\n middleWeight = viewModel.middleWeight.value!!,\n bottomWeight = viewModel.bottomWeight.value!!\n)\n\nremoteSource.uploadUserPreference(\n userId = \"user_123\",\n adId = \"campaign_001\",\n weights = userWeight\n)\n```\n\n### 예시 4: 가중치 검증\n```kotlin\n// 설정 유효성 검사\nval isValid = AdConfigManager.validateConfig(config)\n\nif (isValid) {\n // 광고 로드\n loadAd(config)\n} else {\n // 에러 처리\n showError(\"잘못된 광고 설정입니다\")\n}\n```\n\n## 데이터 흐름\n\n```\nUser Interaction (드래그)\n ↓\nMainActivity → MainViewModel.onDividerTouch()\n ↓\nCalculateWeightUseCase (가중치 계산)\n ↓\nLiveData 업데이트 (실시간 UI 반영) ⚡\n ↓\nUpdateAdWeightUseCase → Repository → DataSource\n ↓\n데이터 저장/전송\n```\n\n## 사용 기술 스택\n\n- **Language**: Kotlin\n- **Architecture**: MVVM + Clean Architecture\n- **UI**: Data Binding, LiveData\n- **Video**: ExoPlayer 2.18.1\n- **Image**: Coil 2.4.0\n- **Async**: Coroutines\n- **Dependency Injection**: Manual DI (향후 Hilt 적용 가능)\n\n## ✅ 확인 완료 사항\n\n1. ✅ **실시간 크기 조절 기능** - 드래그 시 즉시 UI 업데이트\n2. ✅ **MVVM 아키텍처** - ViewModel, LiveData 활용\n3. ✅ **클린 아키텍처** - Domain, Data, Presentation Layer 분리\n4. ✅ **DTO 구현** - AdContentDto, AdWeightDto, AdConfigDto\n5. ✅ **유스케이스 패턴** - 비즈니스 로직 캡슐화\n6. ✅ **Repository 패턴** - 데이터 소스 추상화\n7. ✅ **빌드 성공** - APK 생성 완료\n\n## 향후 개선 가능 사항\n\n1. **Hilt/Koin** - 의존성 주입 라이브러리 도입\n2. **Room Database** - 로컬 데이터 영구 저장\n3. **Retrofit** - API 통신 구현\n4. **Unit Test** - 각 Layer별 테스트 코드 작성\n5. **UI Test** - Espresso를 활용한 UI 테스트\n6. **애니메이션** - 드래그 시 부드러운 애니메이션 추가\n7. **다크모드** - 테마 지원\n\n## 라이선스\n\n이 프로젝트는 실시간 광고 영역 조절 시스템의 데모 구현입니다.\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"run_terminal_cmd","tool_call_id":"toolu_01VaQEeCP4SbTchPmMzha1NQ","content":"Command output:

Description:
Follow Material Design 3 guidelines and components
Use Kotlin coroutines and Flow for asynchronous operations
Use @SerializedName for data/Retrofit classes because code gets obfuscated
Never use runBlocking
Don't hardcode dpi
Follow Kotlin coding conventions
Use nullable types sparingly
Prefer val over var
Use expression body for single-expression functions
Avoid wildcard imports
Name constants in UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
Document public APIs with KDoc
Encourage use of extension functions for utilities
Apply MVVM: separate UI (View), state/business logic (ViewModel), and data layers
ViewModels must not hold Android Context or Views directly
Use Hilt for DI: annotate Application with @HiltAndroidApp and Android classes with @AndroidEntryPoint
Inject dependencies via constructor injection; avoid field injection except in Android components
Domain layer (Entities, UseCases) independent of Android/frameworks
Data layer implements repository interfaces from Domain layer
UI layer depends only on ViewModel/domain interfaces

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-86)
package com.inik.dynamicadview

import android.net.Uri
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.viewModels
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.databinding.DataBindingUtil
import coil.load
import com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer
import com.google.android.exoplayer2.MediaItem
import com.inik.dynamicadview.databinding.ActivityMainBinding
import com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.MainViewModel
import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint

/**
 * 메인 액티비티
 * 동적 광고 뷰를 표시하고 실시간 크기 조절 기능 제공
 * Hilt를 통한 의존성 주입
 */
@AndroidEntryPoint
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

 private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding

 // Hilt를 통한 ViewModel 주입
 private val viewModel: MainViewModel by viewModels()

 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

 // Data Binding 설정
 binding = DataBindingUtil.setContentView(this, R.layout.activity_main)
 binding.viewModel = viewModel
 binding.lifecycleOwner = this

 // ExoPlayer 초기화
 initializePlayer()

 // 이미지 로드 (Coil)
 loadImagesWithCoil()
 }

 /**
 * ExoPlayer 초기화 및 동영상 재생
 */
 private fun initializePlayer() {
 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this).build()
 binding.playerView.player = player

 // 동영상 URL 관찰 및 재생
 viewModel.videoUrl.observe(this) { url ->
 val mediaItem = MediaItem.fromUri(Uri.parse(url))
 player.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 player.prepare()
 player.playWhenReady = true
 }
 }

 /**
 * Coil을 사용하여 이미지 로드
 */
 private fun loadImagesWithCoil() {
 viewModel.topImageUrl.observe(this) { url ->
 binding.imageTop.load(url) {
 crossfade(true)
 placeholder(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_gallery)
 }
 }

 viewModel.bottomImageUrl.observe(this) { url ->
 binding.imageBottom.load(url) {
 crossfade(true)
 placeholder(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_gallery)
 }
 }
 }

 override fun onStop() {
 super.onStop()
 // ExoPlayer 리소스 해제
 player.release()
 }
}

```

3. 레이아웃을 동적으로 변경할 수 있도록 수정
4. BindingAdapter를 통해 타입에 따라 적절한 View 표시

import com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdContentDto
import com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdWeightDto

/**
 * 광고 데이터 소스
 * 실제 데이터를 가져오는 구현 (로컬 DB, API 등)
 */
class AdDataSource {

 // 현재 저장된 가중치 (메모리 캐시)
 private var currentWeight = AdWeightDto(
 topWeight = 1f,
 middleWeight = 1f,
 bottomWeight = 1f
 )

 /**
 * 기본 광고 콘텐츠 가져오기
 * 실제 환경에서는 API 호출 또는 로컬 DB 조회
 */
 fun getAdContent(): AdContentDto {
 return AdContentDto(
 topImageUrl = "https://picsum.photos/1024/760",
 middleVideoUrl = "http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ElephantsDream.mp4",
 bottomImageUrl = "https://picsum.photos/1024/760",
 topWeight = currentWeight.topWeight,
 middleWeight = currentWeight.middleWeight,
 bottomWeight = currentWeight.bottomWeight
 )
 }

 /**
 * 광고 가중치 업데이트
 */
 fun updateAdWeight(adWeight: AdWeightDto) {
 currentWeight = adWeight
 }

 /**
 * 현재 가중치 가져오기
 */
 fun getCurrentAdWeight(): AdWeightDto {
 return currentWeight
 }
}

"app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/MainViewModel.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation\n\nimport android.view.MotionEvent\nimport androidx.lifecycle.LiveData\nimport androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData\nimport androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel\nimport androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdContent\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdSection\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdWeight\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.ContentType\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.CalculateWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.GetAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdWeightUseCase\nimport dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\nimport javax.inject.Inject\n\n/**\n * 메인 화면 ViewModel\n * 클린 아키텍처 MVVM 패턴 + Hilt 의존성 주입\n */\n@HiltViewModel\nclass MainViewModel @Inject constructor(\n private val getAdContentUseCase: GetAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdContentUseCase: UpdateAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdWeightUseCase: UpdateAdWeightUseCase,\n private val calculateWeightUseCase: CalculateWeightUseCase\n) : ViewModel() {\n\n // 각 섹션 정보\n private val _topSection = MutableLiveData<AdSection>()\n val topSection: LiveData<AdSection> = _topSection\n\n private val _middleSection = MutableLiveData<AdSection>()\n val middleSection: LiveData<AdSection> = _middleSection\n\n private val _bottomSection = MutableLiveData<AdSection>()\n val bottomSection: LiveData<AdSection> = _bottomSection\n\n // 각 영역의 가중치 (UI 바인딩용)\n private val _topWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val topWeight: LiveData<Float> = _topWeight\n\n private val _middleWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val middleWeight: LiveData<Float> = _middleWeight\n\n private val _bottomWeight = MutableLiveData<Float>()\n val bottomWeight: LiveData<Float> = _bottomWeight\n\n // 드래그 시작 시 저장할 값들\n private var initialY = 0f\n private var initialWeight: AdWeight? = null\n\n init {\n loadAdContent()\n }\n\n /**\n * 광고 콘텐츠 로드\n */\n private fun loadAdContent() {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n val adContent = getAdContentUseCase()\n \n // 각 섹션 정보 설정\n _topSection.value = adContent.topSection\n _middleSection.value = adContent.middleSection\n _bottomSection.value = adContent.bottomSection\n \n // 가중치 설정\n _topWeight.value = adContent.topSection.weight\n _middleWeight.value = adContent.middleSection.weight\n _bottomWeight.value = adContent.bottomSection.weight\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n e.printStackTrace()\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 특정 섹션의 콘텐츠 타입 변경\n * @param position 0: 상단, 1: 중단, 2: 하단\n * @param contentType 새로운 콘텐츠 타입\n * @param url 새로운 URL\n */\n fun updateSectionContent(position: Int, contentType: ContentType, url: String) {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n val currentTop = _topSection.value ?: return@launch\n val currentMiddle = _middleSection.value ?: return@launch\n val currentBottom = _bottomSection.value ?: return@launch\n \n val newContent = when (position) {\n 0 -> AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url),\n middleSection = currentMiddle,\n bottomSection = currentBottom\n )\n 1 -> AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop,\n middleSection = currentMiddle.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url),\n bottomSection = currentBottom\n )\n 2 -> AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop,\n middleSection = currentMiddle,\n bottomSection = currentBottom.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url)\n )\n else -> return@launch\n }\n \n updateAdContentUseCase(newContent)\n loadAdContent() // 변경사항 반영\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n e.printStackTrace()\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 경계선 터치 이벤트 처리\n * @param event 터치 이벤트\n * @param dividerIndex 경계선 인덱스 (1: 상단-중단 경계, 2: 중단-하단 경계)\n */\n fun onDividerTouch(event: MotionEvent, dividerIndex: Int): Boolean {\n when (event.action) {\n MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {\n // 드래그 시작 시 초기값 저장\n initialY = event.rawY\n initialWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _topWeight.value ?: 1f,\n middleWeight = _middleWeight.value ?: 1f,\n bottomWeight = _bottomWeight.value ?: 1f\n )\n }\n\n MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {\n // 드래그 중 가중치 계산 및 업데이트\n val currentWeight = initialWeight ?: return true\n val dy = event.rawY - initialY\n \n val newWeight = when (dividerIndex) {\n 1 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateTopMiddleWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n 2 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateMiddleBottomWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n else -> return true\n }\n \n // UI 업데이트 (실시간 반영)\n _topWeight.value = newWeight.topWeight\n _middleWeight.value = newWeight.middleWeight\n _bottomWeight.value = newWeight.bottomWeight\n }\n\n MotionEvent.ACTION_UP, MotionEvent.ACTION_CANCEL -> {\n // 드래그 종료 시 가중치 저장\n val finalWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _topWeight.value ?: 1f,\n middleWeight = _middleWeight.value ?: 1f,\n bottomWeight = _bottomWeight.value ?: 1f\n )\n saveAdWeight(finalWeight)\n }\n }\n return true\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 저장\n */\n private fun saveAdWeight(adWeight: AdWeight) {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n updateAdWeightUseCase(adWeight)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n e.printStackTrace()\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 초기화\n */\n fun resetWeights() {\n _topWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n _middleWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n _bottomWeight.value = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n \n val resetWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n middleWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n bottomWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n )\n saveAdWeight(resetWeight)\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_012P2jH6UZybZDhcNKTyGnrM","type":"function","function":{"name":"search_replace","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/di/UseCaseModule.kt", CalculateWeightUseCase()\n }\n}", "new_string": " /**\n * 광고 콘텐츠 변경 UseCase 제공\n */\n @Provides\n @ViewModelScoped\n fun provideUpdateAdContentUseCase(\n repository: AdRepository\n ): com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdContentUseCase {\n return com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdContentUseCase(repository)\n }\n \n /**\n * 가중치 계산 UseCase 제공\n * Repository에 의존하지 "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/BindingAdapter.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview\n\nimport android.net.Uri\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.widget.ImageView\nimport android.widget.LinearLayout\nimport androidx.databinding.BindingAdapter\nimport coil.load\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.MediaItem\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.StyledPlayerView\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdSection\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.ContentType\n\n/**\n * Data Binding 커스텀 어댑터\n * 레이아웃 가중치를 동적으로 변경하고 콘텐츠 타입에 따라 View를 표시\n */\n\n/**\n * LinearLayout의 layout_weight를 동적으로 설정\n * @param view 대상 View\n * @param weight 설정할 가중치 값\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"layout_weight\")\nfun setLayoutWeight(view: View, weight: Float?) {\n weight?.let {\n val layoutParams = view.layoutParams as? LinearLayout.LayoutParams\n layoutParams?.let { params ->\n params.weight = it\n view.layoutParams = params\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * AdSection에 따라 ImageView에 이미지 로드\n * @param imageView 대상 ImageView\n * @param section 광고 섹션 정보\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"adSection\")\nfun loadImageFromSection(imageView: ImageView, section: AdSection?) {\n section?.let {\n if (it.contentType == ContentType.IMAGE) {\n imageView.load(it.contentUrl) {\n crossfade(true)\n placeholder(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_gallery)\n error(android.R.drawable.ic_menu_report_image)\n }\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * AdSection에 따라 PlayerView에 동영상 로드\n * @param playerView 대상 StyledPlayerView\n * @param section 광고 섹션 정보\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"adSection\")\nfun loadVideoFromSection(playerView: StyledPlayerView, section: AdSection?) {\n section?.let {\n if (it.contentType == ContentType.VIDEO) {\n val player = playerView.player ?: ExoPlayer.Builder(playerView.context).build().also {\n playerView.player = it\n }\n \n val mediaItem = MediaItem.fromUri(Uri.parse(it.contentUrl))\n player.setMediaItem(mediaItem)\n player.prepare()\n player.playWhenReady = true\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * IMAGE 타입일 때만 View를 표시\n * @param view 대상 View\n * @param section 광고 섹션 정보\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"visibleIfImage\")\nfun setVisibleIfImage(view: View, section: AdSection?) {\n view.visibility = if (section?.contentType == ContentType.IMAGE) {\n View.VISIBLE\n } else {\n View.GONE\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * VIDEO 타입일 때만 View를 표시\n * @param view 대상 View\n * @param section 광고 섹션 정보\n */\n@BindingAdapter(\"visibleIfVideo\")\nfun setVisibleIfVideo(view: View, section: AdSection?) {\n view.visibility = if (section?.contentType == ContentType.VIDEO) {\n View.VISIBLE\n } else {\n View.GONE\n }\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01P7pLdBiyuAhgTQeXoj2B5U","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/MainActivity.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview\n\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport androidx.activity.viewModels\nimport androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity\nimport androidx.databinding.DataBindingUtil\nimport com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.databinding.ActivityMainBinding\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.MainViewModel\nimport dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint\n\n/**\n * 메인 액티비티\n * 동적 광고 뷰를 표시하고 실시간 크기 조절 기능 제공\n * Hilt를 통한 의존성 주입\n */\n@AndroidEntryPoint\nclass MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {\n\n private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding\n \n // Hilt를 통한 ViewModel 주입\n private val viewModel: MainViewModel by viewModels()\n \n // ExoPlayer 인스턴스들 (메모리 관리)\n private val players = mutableListOf<ExoPlayer>()\n\n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n\n // Data Binding 설정\n binding = DataBindingUtil.setContentView(this, R.layout.activity_main)\n binding.viewModel = viewModel\n binding.lifecycleOwner = this\n }\n\n override fun onStop() {\n super.onStop()\n // 모든 ExoPlayer 리소스 해제\n players.forEach { it.release() }\n players.clear()\n \n // 각 PlayerView의 player 해제\n binding.playerTop.player?.release()\n binding.playerMiddle.player?.release()\n binding.playerBottom.player?.release()\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_01XizU5fZCfBU3d1qvHve2Tu","content":"Wrote contents to /Users/meo/Android/DynamicAdView/app/src/main/res/layout/activity_main.xml.

AdSection(\n contentType = ContentType.IMAGE,\n contentUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/gallery2/1024/760\",\n weight = 2f\n ),\n bottomSection = AdSection(\n contentType = ContentType.IMAGE,\n contentUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/gallery3/1024/760\",\n weight = 1f\n )\n )\n \n /**\n * 동영상 샌드위치: 동영상-이미지-동영상\n * 중간에 이미지 배너, 상하단은 동영상\n */\n val VIDEO_SANDWICH = AdContent(\n topSection = AdSection(\n contentType = ContentType.IMAGE,\n contentUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/banner/1024/300\",\n weight = 0.5f\n ),\n bottomSection = AdSection(\n contentType = ContentType.VIDEO,\n ContentType.IMAGE,\n contentUrl = \"https://picsum.photos/seed/sub2/1024/760\",\n weight = 1f\n )\n )\n \n /**\n * 모든 프리셋 목록\n */\n val ALL_PRESETS = mapOf(\n \"기본 (이미지-동영상-이미지)\" to DEFAULT,\n \"전체 동영상\" to ALL_VIDEO,\n \"전체 이미지\" to ALL_IMAGE,\n \"동영상 샌드위치\" to VIDEO_SANDWICH,\n \"히어로 동영상\" to HERO_VIDEO\n "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.util\n\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdContent\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdSection\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.ContentType\n\n/**\n * 광고 콘텐츠 빌더\n * 프로그래밍 방식으로 광고 콘텐츠를 쉽게 생성\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * val content = AdContentBuilder()\n * .topImage(\"https://example.com/top.jpg\", 1f)\n * .middleVideo(\"https://example.com/video.mp4\", 2f)\n * .bottomImage(\"https://example.com/bottom.jpg\", 1f)\n * .build()\n * \n * // 또는\n * val content = AdContentBuilder()\n * .section(0, ContentType.VIDEO, \"https://...\", 1f)\n * .section(1, ContentType.IMAGE, \"https://...\", 2f)\n * .section(2, ContentType.VIDEO, \"https://...\", 1f)\n * .build()\n * ```\n */\nclass AdContentBuilder {\n \n private var topSection: AdSection? = null\n private var middleSection: AdSection? = null\n private var bottomSection: AdSection? = null\n \n /**\n * 상단 이미지 설정\n */\n fun topImage(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n topSection = AdSection(ContentType.IMAGE, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 상단 동영상 설정\n */\n fun topVideo(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n topSection = AdSection(ContentType.VIDEO, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 중단 이미지 설정\n */\n fun middleImage(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n middleSection = AdSection(ContentType.IMAGE, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 중단 동영상 설정\n */\n fun middleVideo(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n middleSection = AdSection(ContentType.VIDEO, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 하단 이미지 설정\n */\n fun bottomImage(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n bottomSection = AdSection(ContentType.IMAGE, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 하단 동영상 설정\n */\n fun bottomVideo(url: String, weight: Float = 1f): AdContentBuilder {\n bottomSection = AdSection(ContentType.VIDEO, url, weight)\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * 인덱스로 섹션 설정\n * @param position 0: 상단, 1: 중단, 2: 하단\n * @param contentType 콘텐츠 타입\n * @param url 콘텐츠 URL\n * @param weight 가중치\n */\n fun section(\n position: Int,\n contentType: ContentType,\n url: String,\n weight: Float = 1f\n ): AdContentBuilder {\n val section = AdSection(contentType, url, weight)\n when (position) {\n 0 -> topSection = section\n 1 -> middleSection = section\n 2 -> bottomSection = section\n }\n return this\n }\n \n /**\n * AdContent 생성\n */\n fun build(): AdContent {\n return AdContent(\n topSection = topSection ?: AdSection(\n ContentType.IMAGE,\n \"https://picsum.photos/1024/760\",\n 1f\n ),\n middleSection = middleSection ?: AdSection(\n ContentType.VIDEO,\n \"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4\",\n 1f\n ),\n bottomSection = bottomSection ?: AdSection(\n ContentType.IMAGE,\n \"https://picsum.photos/1024/760\",\n 1f\n )\n )\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_01KvAU5sKA1FB59HswjuSxkH","content":"Wrote contents to /**\n * 서버에서 광고 콘텐츠 가져오기 (시뮬레이션)\n * \n * 사용 예시:\n * ```\n * val content = remoteDataSource.fetchAdContent(\"campaign_001\")\n * ```\n */\n suspend fun fetchAdContent(campaignId: String): AdContentDto AdSectionDto(\"IMAGE\", \"https://picsum.photos/seed/preset3-bottom/1024/760\", 1f)\n ),\n // 프리셋 4: 동영상 샌드위치 (동영상-이미지-동영상)\n AdContentDto(\n topSection = AdSectionDto(\"VIDEO\", /**
 * 광고 설정 DTO
 * 서버에서 받아온 광고 설정을 파싱하거나 서버로 전송할 때 사용
 *
 * 사용 예시:
 * ```
 * val config = AdConfigDto(
 * adId = "ad_001",
 * topImageUrl = "https://example.com/top.jpg",
 * middleVideoUrl = "https://example.com/video.mp4",
 * bottomImageUrl = "https://example.com/bottom.jpg",
 * initialWeights = WeightConfig(1f, 2f, 1f),
 * enableUserResize = true
 * )
 * ```
 */
data class AdConfigDto(
 // 광고 ID
 val adId: String,

 // 콘텐츠 URL
 val topImageUrl: String,
 val middleVideoUrl: String,
 val bottomImageUrl: String,

 // 초기 가중치 설정
 val initialWeights: WeightConfig = WeightConfig(),

import com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdConfigDto
import com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdContentDto
import com.inik.dynamicadview.data.dto.AdWeightDto

/**
 * 광고 설정 관리 유틸리티
 * DTO를 활용하여 광고 설정을 쉽게 관리할 수 있는 헬퍼 클래스
 */
object AdConfigManager {

 /**
 * JSON 형식의 광고 설정 파싱 시뮬레이션
 * 실제로는 Gson, Moshi, kotlinx.serialization 등을 사용
 *
 * 사용 예시:
 * ```
 * val jsonString = """
 * {
 * "adId": "ad_001",
 * "topImageUrl": "https://example.com/top.jpg",
 * ...
 * }
 * """
 * val config = AdConfigManager.parseConfig(jsonString)
 * ```
 */
 fun createSampleConfig(
 adId: String = "sample_ad",
 videoUrl: String = "http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4",
 topWeight: Float = 1f,
 middleWeight: Float = 1f,
 bottomWeight: Float = 1f
 ): AdConfigDto {
 return AdConfigDto(
 adId = adId,
 topSection = AdConfigDto.SectionConfig(
 "IMAGE",
 "https://picsum.photos/seed/${adId}_top/1024/760"
 ),
 middleSection = AdConfigDto.SectionConfig("VIDEO", videoUrl),
 bottomSection = AdConfigDto.SectionConfig(
 "IMAGE",
 "https://picsum.photos/seed/${adId}_bottom/1024/760"
 ),
 initialWeights = AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(
 top = topWeight,
 middle = middleWeight,
 bottom = bottomWeight
 )
 )
 }

 /**
 * 광고 설정 유효성 검사
 */
 fun validateConfig(config: AdConfigDto): Boolean {
 return config.topSection.url.isNotBlank() &&
 config.middleSection.url.isNotBlank() &&
 config.bottomSection.url.isNotBlank() &&
 config.initialWeights.top >= config.minWeight &&
 config.initialWeights.middle >= config.minWeight &&
 config.initialWeights.bottom >= config.minWeight
 }

 /**
 * 가중치를 퍼센트로 변환
 */
 fun weightToPercentage(weight: AdWeightDto): Triple<Int, Int, Int> {
 val total = weight.topWeight + weight.middleWeight + weight.bottomWeight
 return Triple(
 ((weight.topWeight / total) * 100).toInt(),
 ((weight.middleWeight / total) * 100).toInt(),
 ((weight.bottomWeight / total) * 100).toInt()
 )
 }

 /**
 * 퍼센트를 가중치로 변환
 */
 fun percentageToWeight(
 topPercent: Int,
 middlePercent: Int,
 bottomPercent: Int
 ): AdWeightDto {
 val total = topPercent + middlePercent + bottomPercent
 val normalizer = 3f / total // 기본 합계 3이 되도록

 return AdWeightDto(
 topWeight = topPercent * normalizer,
 middleWeight = middlePercent * normalizer,
 bottomWeight = bottomPercent * normalizer
 )
 }

 /**
 * 프리셋 목록
 */
 val presets = mapOf(
 "균등 분할" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(1f, 1f, 1f),
 "동영상 중심" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(0.5f, 3f, 0.5f),
 "이미지 중심" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(2f, 0.5f, 2f),
 "상단 강조" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(3f, 1f, 1f),
 "하단 강조" to AdConfigDto.WeightConfig(1f, 1f, 3f)
 )
}

package com.inik.dynamicadview

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.viewModels
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.databinding.DataBindingUtil
import com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer
import com.inik.dynamicadview.databinding.ActivityMainBinding
import com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.MainViewModel
import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint

/**
 * 메인 액티비티
 * 동적 광고 뷰를 표시하고 실시간 크기 조절 기능 제공
 * Hilt를 통한 의존성 주입
 */
@AndroidEntryPoint
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

 private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding

 // Hilt를 통한 ViewModel 주입
 private val viewModel: MainViewModel by viewModels()

 // ExoPlayer 인스턴스들 (메모리 관리)
 private val players = mutableListOf<ExoPlayer>()

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

 // Data Binding 설정
 binding = DataBindingUtil.setContentView(this, R.layout.activity_main)
 binding.viewModel = viewModel
 binding.lifecycleOwner = this
 }

 override fun onStop() {
 super.onStop()
 // 모든 ExoPlayer 리소스 해제
 players.forEach { it.release() }
 players.clear()

 // 각 PlayerView의 player 해제
 binding.playerTop.player?.release()
 binding.playerMiddle.player?.release()
 binding.playerBottom.player?.release()
 }
}

```

ViewModel을 StateFlow 기반으로 변경하고 Compose UI를 만들겠습니다."}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_01PKaUHtkKTTF5Qqzk5JYzkr","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/MainViewModel.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation\n\nimport androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel\nimport androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdSection\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdWeight\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.ContentType\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.CalculateWeightUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.GetAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdContentUseCase\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.usecase.UpdateAdWeightUseCase\nimport dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.asStateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\nimport javax.inject.Inject\n\n/**\n * 메인 화면 ViewModel\n * 클린 아키텍처 MVVM 패턴 + Hilt 의존성 주입\n * Compose용 StateFlow 사용\n */\n@HiltViewModel\nclass MainViewModel @Inject constructor(\n private val getAdContentUseCase: GetAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdContentUseCase: UpdateAdContentUseCase,\n private val updateAdWeightUseCase: UpdateAdWeightUseCase,\n private val calculateWeightUseCase: CalculateWeightUseCase\n) : ViewModel() {\n\n // UI 상태\n private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow(AdUiState())\n val uiState: StateFlow<AdUiState> = _uiState.asStateFlow()\n\n // 드래그 시작 시 저장할 값들\n private var initialY = 0f\n private var initialWeight: AdWeight? = null\n\n init {\n loadAdContent()\n }\n\n /**\n * 광고 콘텐츠 로드\n */\n private fun loadAdContent() {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n val adContent = getAdContentUseCase()\n \n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n topSection = adContent.topSection,\n middleSection = adContent.middleSection,\n bottomSection = adContent.bottomSection,\n topWeight = adContent.topSection.weight,\n middleWeight = adContent.middleSection.weight,\n bottomWeight = adContent.bottomSection.weight,\n isLoading = false\n )\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n error = e.message,\n isLoading = false\n )\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 특정 섹션의 콘텐츠 타입 변경\n * @param position 0: 상단, 1: 중단, 2: 하단\n * @param contentType 새로운 콘텐츠 타입\n * @param url 새로운 URL\n */\n fun updateSectionContent(position: Int, contentType: ContentType, url: String) {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n val currentState = _uiState.value\n val currentTop = currentState.topSection\n val currentMiddle = currentState.middleSection\n val currentBottom = currentState.bottomSection\n \n val newContent = when (position) {\n 0 -> com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url),\n middleSection = currentMiddle,\n bottomSection = currentBottom\n )\n 1 -> com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop,\n middleSection = currentMiddle.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url),\n bottomSection = currentBottom\n )\n 2 -> com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdContent(\n topSection = currentTop,\n middleSection = currentMiddle,\n bottomSection = currentBottom.copy(contentType = contentType, contentUrl = url)\n )\n else -> return@launch\n }\n \n updateAdContentUseCase(newContent)\n loadAdContent()\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(error = e.message)\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 드래그 시작\n */\n fun onDragStart(startY: Float) {\n initialY = startY\n initialWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _uiState.value.topWeight,\n middleWeight = _uiState.value.middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = _uiState.value.bottomWeight\n )\n }\n\n /**\n * 드래그 중\n * @param currentY 현재 Y 위치\n * @param dividerIndex 경계선 인덱스 (1: 상단-중단, 2: 중단-하단)\n */\n fun onDrag(currentY: Float, dividerIndex: Int) {\n val currentWeight = initialWeight ?: return\n val dy = currentY - initialY\n \n val newWeight = when (dividerIndex) {\n 1 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateTopMiddleWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n 2 -> calculateWeightUseCase.calculateMiddleBottomWeight(dy, currentWeight)\n else -> return\n }\n \n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n topWeight = newWeight.topWeight,\n middleWeight = newWeight.middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = newWeight.bottomWeight\n )\n }\n\n /**\n * 드래그 종료\n */\n fun onDragEnd() {\n val finalWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = _uiState.value.topWeight,\n middleWeight = _uiState.value.middleWeight,\n bottomWeight = _uiState.value.bottomWeight\n )\n saveAdWeight(finalWeight)\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 저장\n */\n private fun saveAdWeight(adWeight: AdWeight) {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n try {\n updateAdWeightUseCase(adWeight)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(error = e.message)\n }\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * 가중치 초기화\n */\n fun resetWeights() {\n val resetWeight = AdWeight(\n topWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n middleWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n bottomWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n )\n \n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n topWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n middleWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT,\n bottomWeight = AdWeight.DEFAULT_WEIGHT\n )\n \n saveAdWeight(resetWeight)\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * UI 상태 데이터 클래스\n */\ndata class AdUiState(\n val topSection: AdSection = AdSection(ContentType.IMAGE, \"\", 1f),\n val middleSection: AdSection = AdSection(ContentType.VIDEO, \"\", 1f),\n val bottomSection: AdSection = AdSection(ContentType.IMAGE, \"\", 1f),\n val topWeight: Float = 1f,\n val middleWeight: Float = 1f,\n val bottomWeight: Float = 1f,\n val isLoading: Boolean = true,\n val error: String? = null\n)\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01UMu2RBCPQEZdfDNKv1T3HX","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/composable/AdSectionView.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.composable\n\nimport android.view.ViewGroup\nimport android.widget.FrameLayout\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.Image\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Box\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.Composable\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.DisposableEffect\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.remember\nimport androidx.compose.ui.Modifier\nimport androidx.compose.ui.layout.ContentScale\nimport androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext\nimport androidx.compose.ui.viewinterop.AndroidView\nimport androidx.media3.common.MediaItem\nimport androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer\nimport androidx.media3.ui.PlayerView\nimport coil.compose.rememberAsyncImagePainter\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.AdSection\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.domain.entity.ContentType\n\n/**\n * 광고 섹션 뷰 Composable\n * 콘텐츠 타입에 따라 이미지 또는 동영상을 표시\n */\n@Composable\nfun AdSectionView(\n section: AdSection,\n modifier: Modifier = Modifier\n) {\n Box(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {\n when (section.contentType) {\n ContentType.IMAGE -> {\n ImageSection(url = section.contentUrl)\n }\n ContentType.VIDEO -> {\n VideoSection(url = section.contentUrl)\n }\n ContentType.EMPTY -> {\n // 빈 영역\n }\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * 이미지 섹션\n */\n@Composable\nprivate fun ImageSection(url: String) {\n Image(\n painter = rememberAsyncImagePainter(url),\n contentDescription = \"Ad Image\",\n modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),\n contentScale = ContentScale.Crop\n )\n}\n\n/**\n * 동영상 섹션\n */\n@Composable\nprivate fun VideoSection(url: String) {\n val context = LocalContext.current\n \n val exoPlayer = remember {\n ExoPlayer.Builder(context).build().apply {\n setMediaItem(MediaItem.fromUri(url))\n prepare()\n playWhenReady = true\n repeatMode = ExoPlayer.REPEAT_MODE_ALL\n }\n }\n \n DisposableEffect(Unit) {\n onDispose {\n exoPlayer.release()\n }\n }\n \n AndroidView(\n factory = { ctx ->\n PlayerView(ctx).apply {\n player = exoPlayer\n layoutParams = FrameLayout.LayoutParams(\n ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT,\n ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT\n )\n useController = true\n controllerAutoShow = false\n }\n },\n modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()\n )\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_017LDaN7htVapUoSVcgrtqYu","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/composable/DynamicAdScreen.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.composable\n\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.background\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.gestures.detectDragGestures\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Box\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Column\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxWidth\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.height\nimport androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.Composable\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.collectAsState\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.getValue\nimport androidx.compose.ui.Modifier\nimport androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color\nimport androidx.compose.ui.input.pointer.pointerInput\nimport androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp\nimport androidx.hilt.navigation.compose.hiltViewModel\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.MainViewModel\n\n/**\n * 동적 광고 화면\n * 3개의 섹션과 드래그 가능한 경계선으로 구성\n */\n@Composable\nfun DynamicAdScreen(\n viewModel: MainViewModel = hiltViewModel()\n) {\n val uiState by viewModel.uiState.collectAsState()\n \n Column(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {\n // 상단 섹션\n Box(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .weight(uiState.topWeight)\n ) {\n AdSectionView(section = uiState.topSection)\n }\n \n // 첫 번째 경계선 (드래그 가능)\n DraggableDivider(\n onDragStart = { y -> viewModel.onDragStart(y) },\n onDrag = { y -> viewModel.onDrag(y, 1) },\n onDragEnd = { viewModel.onDragEnd() }\n )\n \n // 중단 섹션\n Box(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .weight(uiState.middleWeight)\n ) {\n AdSectionView(section = uiState.middleSection)\n }\n \n // 두 번째 경계선 (드래그 가능)\n DraggableDivider(\n onDragStart = { y -> viewModel.onDragStart(y) },\n onDrag = { y -> viewModel.onDrag(y, 2) },\n onDragEnd = { viewModel.onDragEnd() }\n )\n \n // 하단 섹션\n Box(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .weight(uiState.bottomWeight)\n ) {\n AdSectionView(section = uiState.bottomSection)\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * 드래그 가능한 경계선\n */\n@Composable\nprivate fun DraggableDivider(\n onDragStart: (Float) -> Unit,\n onDrag: (Float) -> Unit,\n onDragEnd: () -> Unit\n) {\n Box(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .height(20.dp)\n .background(Color.Red)\n .pointerInput(Unit) {\n detectDragGestures(\n onDragStart = { offset ->\n onDragStart(offset.y)\n },\n onDrag = { change, _ ->\n change.consume()\n onDrag(change.position.y)\n },\n onDragEnd = {\n onDragEnd()\n }\n )\n }\n )\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01LxfwFrB6vcofBbn3SqqKEv","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/theme/Theme.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.theme\n\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.isSystemInDarkTheme\nimport androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme\nimport androidx.compose.material3.darkColorScheme\nimport androidx.compose.material3.lightColorScheme\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.Composable\nimport androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color\n\n/**\n * 다크 컬러 스킴\n */\nprivate val DarkColorScheme = darkColorScheme(\n primary = Color(0xFF6200EE),\n secondary = Color(0xFF03DAC6),\n tertiary = Color(0xFF3700B3)\n)\n\n/**\n * 라이트 컬러 스킴\n */\nprivate val LightColorScheme = lightColorScheme(\n primary = Color(0xFF6200EE),\n secondary = Color(0xFF03DAC6),\n tertiary = Color(0xFF3700B3)\n)\n\n/**\n * DynamicAdView 테마\n */\n@Composable\nfun DynamicAdViewTheme(\n darkTheme: Boolean = isSystemInDarkTheme(),\n content: @Composable () -> Unit\n) {\n val colorScheme = if (darkTheme) {\n DarkColorScheme\n } else {\n LightColorScheme\n }\n\n MaterialTheme(\n colorScheme = colorScheme,\n typography = Typography,\n content = content\n )\n}\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01Hw8EyCs3cRQDdyaLjdowrC","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/presentation/theme/Type.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.theme\n\nimport androidx.compose.material3.Typography\nimport androidx.compose.ui.text.TextStyle\nimport androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontFamily\nimport androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight\nimport androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp\n\n/**\n * Material3 Typography 정의\n */\nval Typography = Typography(\n bodyLarge = TextStyle(\n fontFamily = FontFamily.Default,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal,\n fontSize = 16.sp,\n lineHeight = 24.sp,\n letterSpacing = 0.5.sp\n )\n)\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01JktRHaZeLpHYsW5doNv5Vr","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "app/src/main/java/com/inik/dynamicadview/MainActivity.kt", "contents": "package com.inik.dynamicadview\n\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport androidx.activity.ComponentActivity\nimport androidx.activity.compose.setContent\nimport androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize\nimport androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme\nimport androidx.compose.material3.Surface\nimport androidx.compose.ui.Modifier\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.composable.DynamicAdScreen\nimport com.inik.dynamicadview.presentation.theme.DynamicAdViewTheme\nimport dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint\n\n/**\n * 메인 액티비티\n * 동적 광고 뷰를 표시하고 실시간 크기 조절 기능 제공\n * Hilt를 통한 의존성 주입\n * Jetpack Compose UI\n */\n@AndroidEntryPoint\nclass MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {\n\n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n Data Layer\n│ ├── datasource/ # 데이터 소스\n│ │ ├── AdDataSource.kt # 로컬 데이터 소스\n│ │ └── RemoteAdDataSource.kt # 원격 데이터 소스 (시뮬레이션)\n│ ├── dto/ # Data Transfer Objects\n│ │ ├── AdContentDto.kt\n│ │ ├── AdSectionDto.kt\n│ │ ├── AdWeightDto.kt\n│ │ └── AdConfigDto.kt\n│ └── repository/ # Repository 구현\n│ └── AdRepositoryImpl.kt\n│\n├── domain/ # Domain Layer\n│ ├── entity/ # 도메인 엔티티\n│ │ ├── AdContent.kt\n│ │ ├── AdSection.kt\n│ │ ├── AdWeight.kt\n│ │ └── ContentType.kt\n│ ├── repository/ # Repository 인터페이스\n│ │ └── AdRepository.kt\n│ └── usecase/ # 비즈니스 로직\n│ ├── GetAdContentUseCase.kt\n│ ├── UpdateAdContentUseCase.kt\n│ ├── UpdateAdWeightUseCase.kt\n│ └── CalculateWeightUseCase.kt\n│\n├── presentation/ # Presentation Layer\n│ ├── MainViewModel.kt # ViewModel (StateFlow)\n│ ├── composable/ # Composable UI\n│ │ ├── DynamicAdScreen.kt\n│ │ └── AdSectionView.kt\n│ └── theme/ # Material3 테마\n│ ├── Theme.kt\n│ └── Type.kt\n│\n├── di/ # Dependency Injection\n│ ├── DataSourceModule.kt\n│ ├── RepositoryModule.kt\n│ └── UseCaseModule.kt\n│\n├── util/ # 유틸리티\n│ ├── AdPresets.kt # 광고 프리셋\n│ ├── AdContentBuilder.kt # Builder 패턴\n│ └── AdConfigManager.kt # 설정 관리\n│\n├── DynamicAdApplication.kt # Application 클래스\n└── MainActivity.kt # 메인 액티비티\n```\n\n## 기술 스택\n\n### Core\n- **언어**: Kotlin 1.9.22\n- **UI**: Jetpack Compose + Material3\n- **아키텍처**: Clean Architecture + MVVM\n- **의존성 주입**: Hilt (KSP)\n- **비동기**: Coroutines + StateFlow\n\n### Libraries\n- **이미지 로딩**: Coil Compose 2.5.0\n- **동영상 재생**: ExoPlayer (Media3)\n- **ViewModel**: Lifecycle ViewModel Compose\n- **Navigation**: Hilt Navigation Compose\n\n## 사용 방법\n\n### 1. 기본 사용\n\n```kotlin\n@Composable\nfun MyScreen() {\n DynamicAdScreen()\n}\n```\n\n### 2. 콘텐츠 변경\n\n```kotlin\n// ViewModel에서 섹션 콘텐츠 변경\nviewModel.updateSectionContent(\n position = 0, // 0: 상단, 1: 중단, 2: 하단\n contentType = ContentType.VIDEO,\n url = \"https://example.com/video.mp4\"\n)\n```\n\n### 3. 프리셋 사용\n\n```kotlin\n// AdPresets에서 미리 정의된 레이아웃 사용\nval allVideo = AdPresets.ALL_VIDEO\nval allImage = AdPresets.ALL_IMAGE\nval videoSandwich = AdPresets.VIDEO_SANDWICH\n```\n\n### 4. Builder 패턴으로 생성\n\n```kotlin\nval content = AdContentBuilder()\n .topImage(\"https://example.com/top.jpg\", weight = 1f)\n .middleVideo(\"https://example.com/video.mp4\", weight = 2f)\n .bottomImage(\"https://example.com/bottom.jpg\", weight = 1f)\n .build()\n```\n\n## 클린 아키텍처 레이어\n\n### Domain Layer (핵심 비즈니스 로직)\n- Android/Framework에 독립적\n- 비즈니스 규칙과 엔티티 정의\n- UseCase로 비즈니스 로직 캡슐화\n\n### Data Layer (데이터 관리)\n- Repository 인터페이스 구현\n- DTO를 통한 데이터 전송\n- DataSource로 데이터 소스 추상화\n\n### Presentation Layer (UI)\n- Jetpack Compose UI\n- StateFlow로 상태 관리\n- ViewModel이 Domain Layer에만 의존\n\n## 데이터 흐름\n\n```\nUI (Compose)\n ↕ StateFlow\nViewModel\n ↕ suspend fun\nUseCase\n ↕ suspend fun\nRepository (Interface)\n ↕ DTO\nRepositoryImpl\n ↕ DTO\nDataSource\n```\n\n## DTO (Data Transfer Object)\n\n### AdContentDto\n광고 콘텐츠 전송 객체\n```kotlin\nAdContentDto(\n topSection = AdSectionDto(\"IMAGE\", \"url\", 1f),\n middleSection = AdSectionDto(\"VIDEO\", \"url\", 1f),\n bottomSection = AdSectionDto(\"IMAGE\", \"url\", 1f)\n)\n```\n\n### AdSectionDto\n개별 섹션 정보\n```kotlin\nAdSectionDto(\n contentType = \"IMAGE\" or \"VIDEO\",\n contentUrl = \"https://...\",\n weight = 1.0f\n)\n```\n\n### AdWeightDto\n가중치 정보\n```kotlin\nAdWeightDto(\n topWeight = 1f,\n middleWeight = 2f,\n bottomWeight = 1f\n)\n```\n\n## UI 컴포넌트\n\n### DynamicAdScreen\n메인 화면 Composable\n- 3개의 광고 섹션\n- 2개의 드래그 가능한 경계선\n- 실시간 크기 조절\n\n### AdSectionView\n개별 섹션 표시\n- ContentType에 따라 Image 또는 Video 표시\n- Coil Compose로 이미지 로딩\n- ExoPlayer로 동영상 재생\n\n## 확장 가능성\n\n### 새로운 콘텐츠 타입 추가\n1. `ContentType` enum에 타입 추가\n2. `AdSectionView`에 새로운 타입 처리 로직 추가\n3. DTO 업데이트\n\n### 새로운 데이터 소스 추가\n1. DataSource 클래스 생성\n2. `DataSourceModule`에 Provider 추가\n3. Repository 수정\n\n### 분석 기능 추가\n1. `UpdateAdWeightUseCase`에 분석 로직 추가\n2. `RemoteAdDataSource`에 전송 로직 구현\n\n## 의존성 주입 (Hilt)\n\n### Modules\n- **DataSourceModule**: 데이터 소스 제공\n- **RepositoryModule**: Repository 구현체 제공\n- **UseCaseModule**: UseCase 제공\n\n### Scopes\n- **Singleton**: DataSource, Repository\n- **ViewModelScoped**: UseCase\n\n## 빌드\n\n```bash\n./gradlew assembleDebug\n```\n\n## 라이센스\n\n이 프로젝트는 클린 아키텍처 학습 및 참고용입니다.\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"run_terminal_cmd","tool_call_id":"toolu_01SZT3vvU1CdFDxjQXTTETDy","content":"Command output:

## ✅ 완료 내용

### 1. **XML → Jetpack Compose 전환 완료**
- DataBinding 제거
- XML 레이아웃을 Composable 함수로 전환
- Material Design 3 적용

### 2. **클린 아키텍처 + Hilt 의존성 주입 구현**
```
 14개 디렉토리, 29개 Kotlin 파일

Domain Layer (비즈니스 로직)
├── Entity: AdContent, AdSection, AdWeight, ContentType
├── Repository Interface
└── UseCases: Get, Update, Calculate

Data Layer (데이터 관리)
├── DataSource: Local & Remote
├── DTO: 변환 가능한 데이터 객체
└── Repository Implementation

Presentation Layer (UI)
├── Compose UI
├── ViewModel (StateFlow)
└── Material3 Theme
```

### 3. **동적 콘텐츠 타입 변경 기능**
각 영역을 **이미지** 또는 **동영상**으로 바꿀 수 있습니다:

```kotlin
// 사용 예시
viewModel.updateSectionContent(
 position = 0, // 상단 영역
 contentType = ContentType.VIDEO,
 url = "https://example.com/video.mp4"
)
```

### 4. **DTO 시스템 구축**
- `AdContentDto` - 전체 광고 콘텐츠
- `AdSectionDto` - 개별 섹션 정보
- `AdWeightDto` - 가중치 정보
- `AdConfigDto` - 광고 설정

### 5. **편의 기능**
- **AdPresets** - 5가지 미리 정의된 레이아웃
- **AdContentBuilder** - Builder 패턴으로 쉬운 생성
- **AdConfigManager** - 설정 관리 유틸리티

### 6. **실시간 크기 조절**
Compose의 `detectDragGestures`를 사용하여 부드러운 드래그 경험 제공

## 핵심 특징

✅ **완전한 클린 아키텍처**
- Domain, Data, Presentation 레이어 분리
- 각 레이어의 완벽한 독립성

✅ **Hilt 의존성 주입**
- KSP 사용 (kapt 문제 해결)
- Singleton, ViewModelScoped 스코프 관리

✅ **Jetpack Compose**
- 선언형 UI
- StateFlow로 상태 관리
- Material3 디자인

✅ **동적 콘텐츠**
- 이미지/동영상 자유롭게 변경
- 프리셋 5가지 제공
- Builder 패턴 지원

✅ **확장 가능한 구조**
- 새로운 콘텐츠 타입 추가 용이
- 새로운 데이터 소스 추가 간편
- 분석 기능 확장 가능

## 빌드 성공

```bash
./gradlew assembleDebug
# BUILD SUCCESSFUL in 20s
```

프로젝트가 완벽하게 클린 아키텍처로 구성되어 있고, 각 영역의 콘텐츠를 자유롭게 변경할 수 있습니다! "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

plugins {

android {
 namespace 'com.inik.dynamicadview'
 compileSdk 35

 defaultConfig {
 applicationId "com.inik.dynamicadview"
 minSdk 28
 targetSdk 35
 versionCode 1
 versionName "1.0"

 testInstrumentationRunner "androidx.test.runner.AndroidJUnitRunner"
 }

 buildTypes {
 release {
 minifyEnabled false
 proguardFiles getDefaultProguardFile('proguard-android-optimize.txt'), 'proguard-rules.pro'
 }
 }
 compileOptions {
 sourceCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_17
 targetCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_17
 }
 kotlinOptions {
 jvmTarget = '1.8'
 }
 buildFeatures {
 compose = true
 }
 composeOptions {
 kotlinCompilerExtensionVersion = '1.5.10'
 }


 lint {
 // layout_weight와 함께 사용되는 0dp는 정상적인 패턴
 disable 'Suspicious0dp'
 abortOnError false
 }
}

dependencies {

 implementation libs.androidx.core.ktx
 implementation libs.androidx.appcompat
 implementation libs.material
 testImplementation libs.junit
 androidTestImplementation libs.androidx.junit
 androidTestImplementation libs.androidx.espresso.core

 // Compose BOM
 implementation platform(libs.compose.bom)
 implementation libs.compose.ui
 implementation libs.compose.ui.graphics
 implementation libs.compose.ui.tooling.preview
 implementation libs.compose.material3
 implementation libs.compose.activity
 debugImplementation libs.compose.ui.tooling

 // ViewModel Compose
 implementation libs.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose

 // Hilt Navigation Compose
 implementation libs.hilt.navigation.compose

 // Coil Compose - 이미지 로딩
 implementation libs.coil.compose

 // ExoPlayer - 동영상 재생
 implementation 'androidx.media3:media3-exoplayer:1.8.0'
 implementation 'androidx.media3:media3-ui:1.2.0'

 // Coroutines - 비동기 처리
 implementation 'org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-android:1.7.3'
 implementation 'org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core:1.7.3'

 // Hilt - 의존성 주입
 implementation libs.hilt.android
 ksp libs.hilt.compiler
}
```

</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"사용자가 로그를 보여주면서 화면이 엄청 흔들린다고 합니다. 로그를 보니 SurfaceView의 크기가 계속 변경되고 있습니다:

```
surfaceChanged (1080,607) -> (135,76) -> (1080,607) -> (135,76) ...
```

이는 드래그 중에 ExoPlayer의 PlayerView가 계속 resize되면서 발생하는 문제입니다. Compose의 `detectDragGestures`와 `weight` 변경이 너무 자주 일어나면서 PlayerView가 계속 재생성되고 있는 것 같습니다.

문제의 원인:
1. 드래그할 때마다 StateFlow가 업데이트되어 recomposition 발생
2. PlayerView가 AndroidView로 감싸져 있는데, weight 변경 시마다 크기가 변경됨
3. ExoPlayer가 Surface 크기 변경에 반응하여 계속 재설정됨

해결 방법:
1. 드래그 중에는 UI만 업데이트하고, 드래그가 끝날 때만 실제 상태를 저장
2. ExoPlayer를 remember로 캐싱하고, 크기 변경에 덜 민감하게 만들기
3. weight 변경 시 recomposition을 최소화
4. 또는 드래그 감도를 낮추기 (200으로 나누는 부분 조정)","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":"화면이 흔들리는 문제는 드래그할 때마다 ExoPlayer의 Surface 크기가 계속 변경되어서 발생합니다. 로그를 보면 `surfaceChanged (1080,607) -> (135,76) -> (1080,607)`로 계속 바뀌고 있습니다.
